snippet: Hanse Golf Design will team with Amy Alcott to design the Olympic golf course for the 2016 Rio de Janiero Games, when golf will return to the Olympics for the first time since 1904.
abstract: Hanse Golf Design will team with Amy Alcott to design the Olympic golf course for the 2016 Rio de Janiero Games, when golf will return to the Olympics for the first time since 1904.

headline.main: Rio Committee Chooses Design for Olympic Golf Course
